title: Nvidia launches a native GeForce Now app on select Amazon Fire TV sticks, offering up to 1080p and 60 fps gaming; Fire TV users previously had to sideload it (Kris Holt/Engadget)
tags: Engadget;Nvidia launches a native GeForce Now app on select Amazon Fire TV sticks, offering up to 1080p and 60 fps gaming; Fire TV users previously had to sideload it
